data.comment: The match has started.
Bremen's Kevin Mohwald misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 1, It's a goal kick for the away team in Bremen.
Ball safe as Bremen is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Robert Schroder awards Bremen a goal kick.
In the minute 6, Bremen awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Dortmund in their own half.
Throw-in for Bremen at Weserstadion.
In the minute 8, Free kick for Bremen in the half of Dortmund.
Corner awarded to Bremen.
Bremen push upfield but Robert Schroder quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 10, Throw-in Bremen.
Free kick Dortmund.
Axel Witsel (Dortmund) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 12, Goal! Dortmund have got their heads in front thanks to a Raphael Guerreiro strike.
Can Bremen get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Dortmund's half?
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 15, Robert Schroder signals a Dortmund throw-in in Bremen's half.
Can Bremen capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Dortmund's half?
Throw-in high up the field for Bremen in Bremen.
In the minute 19, Goal kick for Dortmund at Weserstadion.
Ball goes out of play for a Dortmund goal kick.
Robert Schroder signals a free kick to Dortmund in their own half.
In the minute 23, Dortmund have been awarded a corner by Robert Schroder.
Free kick for Bremen in their own half.
Dortmund to take a throw-in in Bremen territory.
In the minute 25, Bremen awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Dortmund in their own half.
Robert Schroder signals a free kick to Bremen in their own half.
In the minute 28, Kevin Mohwald grabs a goal to bring things level at 1-1 at Weserstadion.
Corner awarded to Dortmund.
Giovanni Reyna for Dortmund gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 30, Bremen have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Dortmund in the half of Bremen.
Marco Reus (Dortmund) has received a yellow card from Robert Schroder.
In the minute 41, In Bremen a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Manuel Akanji for Dortmund drives towards goal at Weserstadion. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Dortmund have been awarded a corner by Robert Schroder.
In the minute 42, Robert Schroder signals a throw-in for Dortmund, close to Bremen's area.
Bremen's Ludwig Augustinsson is on target but unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Bremen.
In the minute 45, Dortmund awarded a free kick in their own half.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
In the minute 47, Bremen have been awarded a corner by Robert Schroder.
Dortmund are whistled for offside.
Robert Schroder signals a free kick to Bremen in their own half.
In the minute 50, Dortmund are coming forward and Youssoufa Moukoko gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Bremen have a goal kick.
Robert Schroder signals a free kick to Dortmund.
In the minute 54, Christian Gross (Bremen) has received a first yellow card.
Dortmund are pushing forward but Mateu Morey's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Bremen at Weserstadion.
In the minute 55, Free kick Dortmund.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 59, Dortmund are caught offside.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Bremen close to the penalty box.
Axel Witsel is booked for the away team.
Bremen push forward at Weserstadion and Ludwig Augustinsson gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Dortmund defence.
In the minute 61, Corner awarded to Bremen.
Throw-in for Bremen in the half of Dortmund.
Bremen awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 65, Throw-in for Dortmund close to the penalty box.
In the minute 66, Dortmund to take a throw-in in Bremen territory.
Leonardo Bittencourt is on a sub for Kevin Mohwald for Bremen.
Nick Woltemade is replacing Josh Sargent for Bremen at Weserstadion.
Robert Schroder signals a Dortmund throw-in in Bremen's half.
Raphael Guerreiro gets his shot on target but fails to score for Dortmund.
In the minute 70, Can Dortmund get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bremen's half?
Ball goes out of play for a Dortmund goal kick.
Robert Schroder signals a Bremen throw-in in Dortmund's half.
In the minute 72, The home team replace Yuya Osako with Patrick Erras.
Dortmund make their first substitution with Julian Brandt replacing Jude Bellingham.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Bremen.
In the minute 76, Dortmund have been awarded a corner by Robert Schroder.
Dortmund have been given a penalty...
Dortmund were awarded a penalty ... Which Marco Reus failed to convert!
In the minute 78, Goal! Marco Reus gives Dortmund a 1-2 lead.
Dortmund are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Emre Can is replacing Youssoufa Moukoko for the away team.
In the minute 83, Free kick for Bremen in their own half.
The away team have replaced Mats Hummels with Dan-Axel Zagadou. This is the third substitution made today by Edin Terzic.
Edin Terzic (Dortmund) is making a fourth substitution, with Lukasz Piszczek replacing Mateu Morey.
In the minute 86, Florian Kohfeldt is making the team's fourth substitution at Weserstadion with Felix Agu replacing Omer Toprak.
Bremen make their fifth substitution with Romano Schmid replacing Jean-Manuel Mbom.
Dortmund awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 87, Bremen's Nick Woltemade has been booked in Bremen.
Can Bremen capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Robert Schroder awards Dortmund a goal kick.
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Robert Schroder signals a free kick to Dortmund.
Dortmund to take a throw-in in Bremen territory.
Marco Reus of Dortmund gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Bremen goal kick.
The match is over. Final score 1-2.
At Weserstadion, Romano Schmid has been yellow-carded for the home team.
